name: Jim Noir
description: '''Alan Peter Roberts''' (born 1982), known professionally as '''Jim Noir''', is an [[England|English]] musician and producer from [[Davyhulme]], [[Greater Manchester]]. He has released five albums to date: 2005's ''[[Tower of Love (album)|Tower of Love]]'', 2008's self-titled LP ''[[Jim Noir (album)|Jim Noir]]'', 2012's ''[[Jimmy's Show]]'', 2014's ''Finnish Line'', and 2019's ''A.M. Jazz'', as well as a number of [[Extended play|EPs]].
